Module is.inventorysystem
Package model

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
model.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
creates the Inventory class which is used to store all part and product objects

      Returns:
      the next product id

    • lookupByPartId

      public static Part lookupByPartId(int partId)
      searches all inventory for part by id or name and returns only the parts matching the id
      Parameters:
      partId - the part id to search for
      Returns:
      returns parts with matching ID, or null if no match is found

    • lookupByPartName

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> lookupByPartName(String partName)
      searches all inventory for part by name and returns only the parts matching the name
      Parameters:
      partName - the part name to search for
      Returns:
      returns parts with matching name, or null if no match is found

    • lookupByProductId

      public static Product lookupByProductId(int productId)
      searches all inventory for product by id or name and returns only the product
      Parameters:
      productId - the product id to search for
      Returns:
      returns the product with matching ID, or null if no match is found

    • lookupByProductName

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> lookupByProductName(String productName)
      searches all inventory for product by name and returns only the product
      Parameters:
      productName - the product name to search for
      Returns:
      returns the product with matching name, or null if no match is found

    • updatePart

      public static void updatePart(int index, Part selectedPart)
      public static ObservableList lookupPartList(String partName) { ObservableList partsFound = FXCollections.observableArrayList(); for (Part part : allParts) { if (part.getName().contains(partName)) { partsFound.add(part); } } return partsFound; } /** updates the part at the index with the selected part
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the part to update
      selectedPart - the part to update

    • updateProduct

      public static void updateProduct(int index, Product newProduct)
      updates the product at the index with the selected product
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the product to update
      newProduct - the product to update

    • deletePart

      public static boolean deletePart(Part selectedPart)
      deletes the selected part from inventory
      Parameters:
      selectedPart - the part to delete
      Returns:
      true if part is deleted, false if part is not deleted

    • deleteProduct

      public static boolean deleteProduct(Product selectedProduct)
      deletes the selected product from inventory
      Parameters:
      selectedProduct - the product to delete
      Returns:
      true if product is deleted, false if product is not deleted
